s: September 10, 2024 - (Amazon Image) Amazon is lowering prices on thousands of grocery items and rolling out a new private label food brand called Amazon Saver. The discounts come as Amazon aims to offer more products at a lower prices across its entire retail business. t: Amazon Fresh - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Amazon Fresh started in 2007 as an invite-only grocery delivery service in Washington. It rolled out its services gradually, targeting specific parts of various metropolitan areas and partnering with local speciality stores for delivery of local items.
